es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.LambdaReranker

Packages that use LambdaReranker 
Package Description
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.communities
Rerankers that locally enhance community related metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.edge
Rerankers that locally enhacence edge related metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.graph
Rerankers that locally enhance graph metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.user
Rerankers that locally enhance user metrics.

  • Uses of LambdaReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.communities

    Subclasses of LambdaReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.communities 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  InterCommunityDegreeGiniComplement<U>
    Implementation of a reranking strategy for balancing the distribution of the degrees of the communities in a community graph.
    class  InterCommunityEdgeGiniComplement<U>
    Reranks a recommendation by improving the Gini Index of the pairs of different communities in a community graph.
    class  InterCommunityReranker<U>
    Reranker that uses community metrics of the user graph.
    class  InverseCommunitySizeReranker<U>
    Implementation of a reranker which promotes recommending links in small communities.
    class  WeakTies<U>
    Implementation of a reranker which promotes the number of weak ties (links between communities).

  • Uses of LambdaReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.edge

    Subclasses of LambdaReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.edge 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  EdgeMetricReranker<U>
    Abstract implementation of a reranking algorithm that modifies the ranking according to the values of an edge metric.
    class  OriginalDirectEdgeMetricReranker<U>
    Reranker that optimizes the average value of an edge metric.
    class  OriginalInverseEdgeMetricReranker<U>
    Reranker that minimizes the average value of an edge metric.
    class  ProgressiveDirectEdgeMetricReranker<U>
    Reranker that optimizes the average value of an edge metric.
    class  ProgressiveInverseEdgeMetricReranker<U>
    Reranker that minimizes the average value of an edge metric.

  • Uses of LambdaReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.graph

    Subclasses of LambdaReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.graph 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ClusteringCoefficientComplement<U>
    Reranker that tries to promote the opposite of the clustering coefficient of the graph.
    class  DirectGraphMetricReranker<U>
    Individual reranker, which reorders a recommendation to promote a graph metric.
    class  GraphMetricReranker<U>
    Individual reranker, which reorders a recommendation according to a graph metric.
    class  InverseGraphMetricReranker<U>
    Individual reranker, which reorders a recommendation to demote a graph metric.

  • Uses of LambdaReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.user

    Subclasses of LambdaReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.user 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  OriginalDirectUserMetricReranker<U>
    Reranker that optimizes the average value of vertex metric.
    class  OriginalInverseUserMetricReranker<U>
    Reranker that minimizes the average value of vertex metric.
    class  ProgressiveDirectUserMetricReranker<U>
    Implementation of a reranking strategy for contact recommendation that promotes the average value of some vertex metric in the resulting network.
    class  ProgressiveInverseUserMetricReranker<U>
    Implementation of a reranking strategy for contact recommendation that demotes the average value of some vertex metric in the resulting network.
    class  UserMetricReranker<U>
    Individual reranker, which reorders a recommendation according to a user metric we want to optimize.
